mapper.insert: INSERT INTO market_product(product_title,product_seller ,product_photo0,product_photo1, product_photo2,product_photo3, product_content,product_category, product_price, product_place, product_placedetail )VALUES( #{product_title},#{product_seller}, #{filename0},#{filename1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filename2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filename3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ${product_content},${product_category}, ${product_price},${product_place}, ${product_placeDetail})
